model_info: Template for describing your machine learning model and task. Replace with specific details about your model architecture, dataset, and training approach.
optimization_goal: Maximize the primary metric to achieve the best model performance. Specify whether to maximize (e.g., accuracy, F1-score) or minimize (e.g., loss, error rate) your target metric.
dataset_info: Description of your dataset including data types, preprocessing steps, augmentation techniques, and any domain-specific considerations that affect hyperparameter tuning.

learning_rate.description: Learning rate controls the step size for gradient-based optimization. Critical hyperparameter that affects convergence speed and final performance.
learning_rate.guide: must follow the range that is given below for choosing the value of its hyperparameter.

batch_size.description: Number of samples processed simultaneously during training. Affects gradient stability, memory usage, and convergence behavior.
batch_size.guide: must choose from the ordinal options provided below.

epochs.description: Number of complete passes through the training dataset. Controls training duration and convergence.
epochs.guide: must follow the range that is given below for choosing the value of its hyperparameter.

weight_decay.description: L2 regularization parameter that penalizes large weights to prevent overfitting. Higher values provide stronger regularization.
weight_decay.guide: must follow the range that is given below for choosing the value of its hyperparameter.

momentum.description: Momentum parameter for SGD optimizer. Helps accelerate gradients in consistent directions and dampens oscillations.
momentum.guide: must follow the range that is given below for choosing the value of its hyperparameter.

dropout_rate.description: Dropout probability for regularization. Randomly sets fraction of inputs to zero during training to prevent overfitting.
dropout_rate.guide: must follow the range that is given below for choosing the value of its hyperparameter.

hidden_units.description: Number of units in hidden layers. Controls model capacity and representation learning capability.
hidden_units.guide: must follow the range that is given below for choosing the value of its hyperparameter.

optimizer.description: Optimization algorithm for training. Different optimizers have varying convergence properties and hyperparameter sensitivity.
optimizer.guide: must choose from the categorical options provided below.

activation.description: Activation function for neural network layers. Affects gradient flow and model expressiveness.
activation.guide: must choose from the categorical options provided below.

model_size.description: Overall model size category affecting architecture complexity and computational requirements.
model_size.guide: must choose from the ordinal options provided below.

metrics.description: Primary metric used for hyperparameter optimization. This should match the metric name that your model training script reports in the results.json file.
